author: bloritsch
msg: Add some declaration scopes for correctness/security.  Added some RuntimeException
handling.  I am running J-Test, and the fixes are in response to the white-box testing
and uncaught runtime exceptions.  We need to be carefull about those!!!

author: greenrd
msg: encoding support for including non-xml files

author: giacomo
msg: Added substitution to <parameters> elements. Patch submitted by Stuart Roebuck.

author: prussell
msg: Added logging to ComponentPool to make it easier to track down components
